fb3f6e98-b66c-4f15-ba7d-2cc3d94a8d23.cf9473e8-495c-48d8-9bd5-1428a9424ff5.transition.description=Unable to send recent email. fb3f6e98-b66c-4f15-ba7d-2cc3d94a8d23.d7b0840e-e198-4ea8-a390-6b3ae0fb256e.transition.description=not recent email sent\: ${emailNotRecent} fb3f6e98-b66c-4f15-ba7d-2cc3d94a8d23.description=
Checks to see if a date and time occurred recently. The operator will then send an email detailing whether the date/time combination occurred recently.If locale is specified, the date and time will be in the format based on locale, otherwise, default locale will be used. 

Inputs\:
    threshold - The number of milliseconds ago that still qualifies as recently.
    dateTime - The date to check,if the loacle is en, it is in Jul 12, 2006 4\:23\:20 PM format
    emailHost - The SMTP host to use when sending email.
    emailPort - The SMTP port to use when sending email.
    emailFrom - The email address the message will come from.
    emailTo - The email address the message will go to.
    subject - The subject of the email.
    body - The  body of the email message.
    checkName - The name of the value being checked. Will be used in email message generation.
    emailRecent - If set to false emails will not be sent it the event occurred recently, otherwise they will be.
    emailNotRecent - If set to false emails will not be sent it the event did not occur recently, otherwise they will be.
    emailFailed - If set to false emails will not be sent if the flow fails, otherwise they will be.
    localeLang - The locale language for date and time string.
Examples\:  en, ja, unix.
    localeCountry - The locale country for date and time string. For example, US or JP. If localeLang is not specified, this input will be ingored.

Responses\:
    recent - The event ran recently.
    notRecent - The event has not run recently.
    failure - The operation failed.

Results\:
    The number of milliseconds ago the event occurred.

Notes\:
    1. For UNIX value in dateTime, just use the value 'unix' for input LocaleLang and the operation will treat the input dates as UNIX timestamps. In this case localeCountry input is ignored.
fb3f6e98-b66c-4f15-ba7d-2cc3d94a8d23.dff5e6de-0f46-4777-b512-288a41ee271d.transition.description=Recent email sent\: ${emailRecent}
flow.name: Recently Run

staticBinding.value: ${subject}: FAILED - unable to determine if recently run

Operations Orchestration could not determine whether ${checkName} has been recently run.
${body}
